author: Adi Robertson
title: Facebook is promising UK health facilities 2,000 Portal devices
description: Facebook will provide up to 2,050 Portal video calling devices to UK hospitals and other health facilities through the NHSX to prevent social isolation and enable telehealth during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
They could reduce loneliness and improve telehealth
Photo by Dan Seifert / The Verge
